timeline.message: added ability to use exp-pause-between-retries on queue msgs reprocessing

timeline.bodyText: First, just calculate the value of the "pause" variable and then use try{ sleep }catch block to avoid code duplication.
timeline.author: ashvayka

timeline.bodyText: This variable is redundant. You can use expDegreeStep and just compare the maxExpPauseBetweenRetries and new Double(Math.pow(pauseBetweenRetries, expDegreeStep.getAndIncrement())).longValue();
timeline.author: ashvayka
